synopsis.text: After a failed assassination attempt on King Richard, it becomes apparent that the royal family is being targeted by a shadowy group of killers. Princess Mary, next in line to the throne, is at risk. Enter Team White Pigeon - an elite squad charged with protecting the princess while tracking down deadly explosives smuggled into the country. But the mission grows complicated when it's revealed that Princess Charlotte has secretly taken the place of Ange, one of the team's key operatives, as part of their security plan. Now Charlotte finds herself thrust into peril, forced to evade the same assassins targeting her sister. With royal lives on the line, Team White Pigeon races against time to stop the ticking bombs and neutralize the threat before the scheming killers can strike again. The stage is set for another thrilling and suspenseful adventure!
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
